channel.title: Mass clicking spec
channel.description:
To stop this i want to make it like: when you spec with a Gmaul and you have no spec Left, it says "you do not have enough special energy left!"
and also, in most servers, when your fighting, you can just maul spec without clicking the person! how can i change this it could be saying "your not fighting anything.." and doesnt allow you to spec unless you click the enemy.
Soz, and also again -.- They is a Glicth, you may not think it is, but it is for instance your like 5 steps away from your emeny and you can just spec from there, when actually your supposed to be right next to the person to spec, maybe like this? [code] if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4153 && withinDistance(#,#) { c.sM("You need to get close to the enemy before using the special!"); return;[/code] Anyways can someone help me out????
PS: for any noobs out there who arent going to help, please dont post, i dont want to be spoonfed all i want to know how can i do it, not for you to show me how to do, Also Don't be a nerd, saying whatever.

item.title: Mass clicking spec
item.dc:creator: @12mil 12mil
item.description:
@12mil wrote:

To stop this i want to make it like:
when you spec with a Gmaul and you have no spec Left, it says “you do not have enough special energy left!”

and also, in most servers, when your fighting, you can just maul spec without clicking the person! how can i change this it could be saying “your not fighting anything…” and doesnt allow you to spec unless you click the enemy.

Soz, and also again -.- They is a Glicth, you may not think it is, but it is for instance your like 5 steps away from your emeny and you can just spec from there, when actually your supposed to be right next to the person to spec, maybe like this?

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 4153 && withinDistance(#,#) { c.sM("You need to get close to the enemy before using the special!"); return;
Anyways can someone help me out???

PS: for any noobs out there who arent going to help, please dont post, i dont want to be spoonfed all i want to know how can i do it, not for you to show me how to do, Also Don’t be a nerd, saying whatever.
